title: Security Audit
description: Comprehensive security analysis with OWASP Top 10 coverage
prompt:
Perform a comprehensive security audit:

[PASTE CODE HERE]

Security Assessment:
1. OWASP Top 10: Check all categories
2. Input Validation: Sanitization, type checking
3. Authentication & Authorization: Password storage, session management
4. Data Protection: Encryption, sensitive data exposure
5. API Security: Rate limiting, CORS
6. Dependencies: Outdated packages, CVEs
7. Code Issues: Hardcoded secrets, race conditions

Provide severity ratings and detailed fixes with code examples.
example: Audit a Node.js Express API with authentication
